content: seamless tote bag this is a tote bag knit in one piece from the bottom up 120 grams 8ply cotton or dk yarn of choice gauge 22 stitches - 4 inches stocking stitch gauge not really important for this project needles - size 4mm circular 1 straight needle for binding off strap stitches - 3 needle bind off base of bag cast on 55 stitches and knit 24 row flat not in the round body of bag leave these stitches on needle and pick up 12 stitches along side of knitting pick up 55 stitches along cast on edge and pick up 12 stitches along other side of work you now have a total of 134 stitches place marker at beginning of row and start knitting in the round knit 5 row purl 2 row yo knit 2 together until end of row purl 2 row knit 10 row purl 2 row yo knit 2 together until end of row purl 2 row knit 15 row purl 2 row yo knit 2 together until end of row purl 2 row knit 15 row purl 2 row yo knit 2 together until end of round purl 2 row knit 10 row purl 2 row yo knit 2 together until end of round purl 2 row knit 5 row purl 1 row make sure you are at the front of bag and not the side cast off 55 stitches purlwise purl 12 stitches and place these stitches on another straight needle cast off 55 stitches purlwise purl 12 stitches these 12 stitches will make the strap strap continue knitting the 12 stitches garter stitch for 64 row - or length desired knit flat - not in the round place strap across to other side of bag making sure it is not twisted and cast off with remaining 12 stitches using a 3 needle bind off there are good tutorials on youtube to help with the bind off sew in the ends and you are done bag measures approximately 13 inches wide and 14 inches deep 33cm x 25 5cm enjoy ©suzyknits 2012
